popupAnnouncement.ctaText: Discover MetaMask Portfolio today. Track and manage your web3 assets in one place!

popupAnnouncementTreatment.ctaText: Watch your crypto grow with Pooled Staking. Stake your crypto and earn rewards for securing the Ethereum network.

seo.pageTitle: Web3 for Companies and DAOs: MetaMask Institutional Insights
seo.pageDescription: Expand Your Reach in Web3 with MetaMask's Unmatched Network and Multi-Signature Transaction Approvals.

childMarkdownRemark.html: Get the unrivaled reach of MetaMask along with multi-sig transaction approvals.

cta.displayText: Read about the MMI x Safe Partnership

node.headline: Why web3 companies love MetaMask Institutional

childMarkdownRemark.html:
All of MetaMask
Web3 companies and DAOs can use MMI to gain access to all of Web3
Holistic monitoring
Get a consolidated view of all assets across EVM chains on the Portfolio Dashboard
Detailed transaction reporting
View transaction history, get snapshots of weekly, monthly and quarterly valuations, provide read-only access and CSV downloads to their treasury portfolio valuation, and input reference notes for each transaction.

Web3 companies and DAOs can choose to work with contract wallets that integrate multi-signature signing processes. This allows multiple stakeholders to sign off on a transaction before funds are released, and secures funds against unilateral or unauthorized movements.

node.headline: Interact with over 17,000 web3 protocols and applications

childMarkdownRemark.html: MetaMask serves over 30M monthly active users and is connected to almost every web3 dapp. Trade, invest, stake, lend, borrow, provide liquidity, and bridge assets across EVM chains.

node.eyebrow: UNRIVALED CONNECTIVITY TO ALL OF WEB3

node.headline: Access DeFi with the blue fox
